availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Evan M. Taylor (Nicholas County, KY, physician)

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, physician. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Throckmorton Taylor in Nicholas County, Kentucky, on October 13, 1856. Physician in Fleming County, Kentucky, in 1850. Physician in Nicholas County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, District 1, p. 284B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, District 2, p. 474.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Nicholas County Marriages, Film 000252393, p. 291.
